questions.question_stem: There are n socks in a drawer, 3 of which are red. What is the value of n if, when 2 of the socks are chosen randomly, the probability that they are both red is 1/2?
questions.question_stem_html: There are n socks in a drawer, 3 of which are red. What is the value of n if, when 2 of the socks are chosen randomly, the probability that they are both red is 1/2?
